name: sciencescraper
description: An article repository that scrapes a popular science news sites for up to date articles. Users can view an article summary, comment on an article, and visit the site to read the full article.  ## Getting Started

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm --production=false && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd api && nodemon server.js" "cd client && npm run start"
